channel.title: I need help hosting a server
channel.description:
I was trying to host a server and when i tried I got as far as the default gateway. I saw a post where it said to put it in your web browser and I tried putting the full Default Gateway . . . . . . . . . : **.**.***.* up and just the **.**.**.* in the browser but it said that the searching didnt find anything.
How do I work it...I'm probably doing it completely wrong hehe
any help is gladly appreciated.
thank you, masturbasser / david
p.s. sorry to put it in here.... no one replied to me =/

item.title: I need help hosting a server
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Yes i know that, but he wants to know how to portforward, he didn’t say he couldn’t port forward, hamachi should be a last result because it’s shitty.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help hosting a server
item.dc:creator: @r34p4g3pk r34p4g3pk
item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

[quote=“xtrascape-4ever, post:4, topic:270123”]if you cant portforward use hamachi[/quote] That has to be the most useless piece of help i have ever seen in this section, other then not helping at all. I highly suggest you read and follow a tutorial on how to make a server carefully, usually there’s nothing wrong with your router/computer, it’s usually the people like you that result here after one tiny problem and not trying to fix it, if you don’t get the answer you quit and turn to hamachi, tbh hamachi is terrible.

Some of that was very off topic, but it doesn’t matter it was a response to xtra’s post.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help hosting a server

I was trying to host a server and when i tried I got as far as the default gateway.
I saw a post where it said to put it in your web browser and I tried putting the full Default Gateway . . . . . . . . . : ... up and just the ...* in the browser but it said that the searching didnt find anything.
